member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLabelFitMode
member.summary: Determines the label fit mode of the chart axis labels.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLabelFitMode.None
member.summary: Does not attempt to fit the axis labels.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLabelFitMode.MultiLine
member.summary: Arranges axis labels on multiple lines with each label on a different line than its neighbor labels.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLabelFitMode.Rotate
member.summary: Arranges the axis labels so that they are rotated some degrees around their top left corner.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation
member.summary: Defines the supported position for horizontally and vertically rendered axis.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation.Unset
member.summary: The vertical axis should be located at the left side of the plot area. The horizontal axis should be located below the plot area.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation.Left
member.summary: The vertical axis should be located at the left side of the plot area.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation.Right
member.summary: The vertical axis should be located at the right side of the plot area.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation.Bottom
member.summary: The horizontal axis should be located below the plot area.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisLocation.Top
member.summary: The horizontal axis should be located above the plot area.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisPlotMode
member.summary: Defines how data points are plotted relatively to the ticks of the axis.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisPlotMode.BetweenTicks
member.summary: Points are plotted in the middle of the range, defined by two ticks.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.AxisPlotMode.OnTicks
member.summary: Points are plotted over each tick.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.ChartSeriesCombineMode
member.summary: Defines how multiple series of same type are combined on the plot area.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.ChartSeriesCombineMode.None
member.summary: No combining. Each series is plotted independently.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.ChartSeriesCombineMode.Cluster
member.summary: Series are combined next to each other.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.ChartSeriesCombineMode.Stack100
member.summary: Series for stacks that occupy 100% of the plot area.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.DateTimePlotStretchMode
member.summary: Defines the different modes used to plot a by a model.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.DateTimePlotStretchMode.TickSlot
member.summary: Each point is stretched within the owning tick (plot) slot.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.DateTimePlotStretchMode.Uniform
member.summary: Each point's length is proportional to the total number of points plotted by the axis.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.GridLineVisibility
member.summary: Defines the visibility of the major and minor lines within a .

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.GridLineVisibility.X
member.summary: The lines along the X-axis are visible.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.GridLineVisibility.Y
member.summary: The lines along the Y-axis are visible.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.GridLineVisibility.XY
member.summary: The lines are visible along both axes.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.NumericalAxisRangeExtendDirection
member.summary: Specifies how a numerical axis auto-range will be extended so that each data point is visualized in the best possible way.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.NumericalAxisRangeExtendDirection.None
member.summary: The range minimum is the minimum data point value and the range maximum is the maximum data point value.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.NumericalAxisRangeExtendDirection.Positive
member.summary: The range maximum will be extended (if necessary) with one major step.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.NumericalAxisRangeExtendDirection.Negative
member.summary: The range minimum will be extended (if necessary) with one major step.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.NumericalAxisRangeExtendDirection.Both
member.summary: The range will be extended in both directions by one major tick step.

member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.TimeInterval
member.summary: Specifies the predefined time interval types.

member.name: F:Telerik.XamarinForms.Chart.TimeInterval.Unset
member.summary: The interval will be calculated automatically.
